title: True Love Waits
lastfmSummary: "True Love Waits" is the closing track of Radiohead's ninth LP, A Moon Shaped Pool. It was previously released on the live album I Might Be Wrong: Live Recordings in 2001. Prior to this release, it was one of the most requested live songs in the band's catalog, performed on occasion prior to the release of OK Computer and during the Kid A and Amnesiac tours. When asked about the meaning of the line "I'll dress like your niece," Thom had this to say: "the difference between young and old when people start to dress sensible and act their age. Read more on Last.fm.
